Provides adaptive trend estimation, cycle detection, Fourier harmonic
selection, bootstrap confidence intervals, change-point detection, and
rolling-origin forecasting. Supports LOESS, GAM, and GAMM models, and
automatically handles irregular sampling using the Lombâ€“Scargle
periodogram. Designed for biomedical, environmental, and engineering
time-series analysis.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`adaptive_cycle_trend_analysis()`](adaptive_cycle_trend_analysis.md)
  : Adaptive Trend and Cycle Analysis for Time Series
